name: Mayor Match
description:
Welcome to our Town!


Help the Mayor by breaking obstacles and beat levels. Complete tasks as you complete fantastic match 3 levels. Create power-ups by making matches and look for the most useful combination to help you pass the puzzle levels! In addition, enjoyable mini-games await you in each chapter.


Come now and join the Mayor in this adventure!

Mayor Match Features;

• Amazing power-ups and powerful combos!
• Different boosters to relax you when you feel stuck!
• Lots of mini-games with different mechanics!
• Help your townspeople in every chapter by completing tasks!
• Complete all unique levels to compete with skilled players!
